title: Bangladesh Economics Olympiad 2025
description: BDEO is an annual national competition on Economics, Financial Literacy, and Business Case Solving for high school (O-Level) and college-level (A-Level) students. The top-performing students will represent Bangladesh at the International Economics Olympiad 2025, Azerbaijan and other prestigious international events. University students can also participate but are only eligible up to national level.
eligibility: High School (O-Level) & College (A-Level) Students; University Students up to national round

title: International Astronomy and Astrophysics Competition 2025
description: An International competition on Astronomy and Astrophysics for high school and university students worldwide.

title: International Quant Championship 2025
description: WorldQuant BRAIN's 2025 International Quant Championship is now open to individuals and teams of 1 to 4 people. Join WorldQuant's flagship quant competition and compete for cash prizes from a pool of $100,000 and the potential to be considered for internships and consultant positions.
eligibility: individuals and teams of 1 to 4 people

title: Agent X
description: Agent X is an AI Prompting Competition presented by NetCom Learning and Powered by Microsoft.
